title: The Story Behind These Heartbreaking Pictures | Serra Pelada

media:group.media:title: The Story Behind These Heartbreaking Pictures | Serra Pelada
media:group.media:description:
Sebastiao Salgado famously took breathtaking photographs of the Serra Pelada in Brazil. This gold mine has been captured by many photographers through various voices and styles.

Check out the interview with Raw Society:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JocF9uZMdOk
